response.original_title: Blue's Clues & You!: Story Time with Blue
response.overview: Are you ready for Story Time with Blue? Play Blue's Clues to help figure out Blue's favorite story. Then, imagine along with Josh and Blue, attend Blue's first pajama party, and help Blue's friends discover her favorite part of bedtime! This special two-DVD set also includes Blue's Biggest Stories in celebration of the show's 25th Anniversary! Steve and Joe join Blue and all of her friends for more stories!
response.title: Blue's Clues & You!: Story Time with Blue
